attributes.name: collapse
attributes.desc: whether the menu is collapsed (available only in vertical mode)

attributes.name: active-text-color
attributes.desc: text color of currently active menu item (hex format)

attributes.name: default-openeds
attributes.desc: array that contains indexes of currently active sub-menus

attributes.name: unique-opened
attributes.desc: whether only one sub-menu can be active

attributes.name: menu-trigger
attributes.desc: how sub-menus are triggered, only works when `mode` is 'horizontal'

attributes.name: router
attributes.desc: whether `vue-router` mode is activated. If true, index will be used as 'path' to activate the route action

attributes.name: collapse-transition
attributes.desc: whether to enable the collapse transition

events.name: @select
events.desc: callback function when menu is activated
events.param: index: index of activated menu, indexPath: index path of activated menu

events.name: @open
events.param: index: index of expanded sub-menu, indexPath: index path of expanded sub-menu

events.name: @close
events.param: index: index of collapsed sub-menu, indexPath: index path of collapsed sub-menu

methods.name: open
methods.param: index: index of the sub-menu to open

methods.name: close
methods.param: index: index of the sub-menu to close
